name: Popup Alerts
description: Allows the content of descriptive text fields to be displayed as an alert in a modal window for better visibility.

action-tags.description: Displays the field's label as the content of a modal popup when the field becomes visible due to branching logic. The field is also then hidden, so as not to duplicate the information. The modal can be given a custom title by @ALERT="Custom title". Otherwise it will have a default title of "Alert".

project-settings.name:
Modal title
Default title of modal popup alert. Overridden by @ALERT="Custom title".
Default: "Alert"
